definition: mushroom cloud
mushroom
mushroom
cloud/CL:朵[duo3]
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: The mushroom cloud of the a-bomb hang over the desert again.
sentences.chinese: 炸的蘑菇雲再度籠罩在沙漠的上空。

sentences.english: You need look no further than the mushroom cloud mounted on his motorbike.
sentences.chinese: 你只需要看看他的摩托車上升起的蘑菇雲就明白了。

sentences.english: The cloud was dissipating in the blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 蘑菇雲在藍天下消散了。

sentences.english: Because we've heard it said that every mushroom cloud.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我們曾聽說每個蘑菇雲過後。

sentences.english: I turned around and watched a white mushroom cloud rise up about a mile away.
sentences.chinese: 我轉過身來，看見一英里遠的地方升起白色的蘑菇雲。

sentences.english: From the mountain a giant mushroom cloud billowed into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 一團巨大的蘑菇雲直衝雲霄，越滾越大。

definition: to whisper to one another's ear
(idiom) to have one's words turn out to be (tragically) prophetic
lit. plaintive whine of geese (idiom); fig. land swarming with disaster victims/starving people fill the land
38th parallel, forming the DMZ border between North and South Korea
muffled thunder/(fig.) sudden shock/blow
(jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
clan/race
daring/presumptuous/daredevil
lit. the river that divides Chu and Han/fig. a line that divides rival territories/the mid-line between sides on a Chinese chessboard
just a word or two (idiom); a few isolated phrases
doddering/senile
a short time/a little while
without a retreat route/caught in a dead end/having burned one's bridges
to charge/to pounce on/to swoop down on
hum/drone/buzz
